flawed_nl_solution:
He needs 10*6=<<10*6=60>>60 feet
He loses 20*0.25=<<20*0.25=5>>5 feet each time
So he gets 20-5=<<20-5=20>>20 feet from each piece
That means he needs 60/20=<<60/20=3>>3 pieces of rope
